definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: And there's something on that grass that cures that blood disease.
sentences.chinese: 草葉子上面的什麼東西就把她的血液病給治好了。

sentences.english: The fresh air and exercise cured him of his headache.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸新鮮空氣和堅持鍛鍊把他的頭痛病治好了。

sentences.english: If the ruler appoints virtuous men of experience and age, myriad affairs will be well managed.
sentences.chinese: 君主信任年高德助的老臣，萬事都能治好。

sentences.english: For he had healed many; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him, as many as had plagues.
sentences.chinese: 他治好了許多人，所以凡有災病的，都擠進來要摸他。

sentences.english: After my wound is healed, I will go to Liu Bang .
sentences.chinese: 等我的傷口治好了，我將會去劉邦那。

sentences.english: And you fixed them up with the plasters in your first-aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 你用急救箱中的橡皮膏治好了它。

sentences.english: Several days later, all the soldiers and horses were cured.
sentences.chinese: 幾天過後，全營人馬的“尿血癥”都治好了。

sentences.english: Why does this fellow send someone to me to be cured of his leprosy?
sentences.chinese: 這人竟打發人來，叫我治好他的大麻瘋。

sentences.english: And he touched his ear, and healed him.
sentences.chinese: 就摸那人的耳朵，把他治好了。

sentences.english: So the waters were healed unto this day, according to the saying of Elisha which he spake.
sentences.chinese: 於是那水治好了，直到今日，正如以利沙所說的。

sentences.english: Eye retina nerve is atrophic, can you cure?
sentences.chinese: 眼睛視網膜神經萎縮，可以治好嗎？

sentences.english: The ours tells me that the doctors have done wonders for your heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 護士告訴我醫生奇蹟般地治好了你的心臟病。

sentences.english: This medicine will set you right.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥會把你的病治好。

sentences.english: Very grateful to Dr. Tao Xie solution cured my shoulder pain.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝解濤醫生治好了我的肩痛。

sentences.english: My husband and mother of chronic pharyngitis is the traditional method of cure.
sentences.chinese: 我老公和媽媽的慢性咽炎就是用傳統方法治好的。

sentences.english: Progestational hormone. Estrogen is very low, can be this treated?
sentences.chinese: 孕激素。雌激素都很低，這能治好嗎？

definition: to recover completely (from illness or injury)
variant of 痊癒|痊愈[quan2 yu4]
to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
to recover spontaneously (from an illness)/to get better without medical treatment
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
